inclusion.criterion: Breast cancer patients with infiltrated axillary lymph nodes cT1-4 cN1
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to understand and accept the protocol procedure and to sign an informed consent form in accordance with national legislation.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Breast cancer patients in whom no information about axillary lymph nodes status (cytology or biopsy) is available.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative.
